name: 239 Keycards
description:
A game made in under 5 hours on a faithful Sunday evening.

Spiritual successor to "You Have 293 Keys".

Walk around with WASD. Pick stuff up with left mouse button. Throw it away again the same way. Use right mouse button while holding an item to rotate it, and in some cases use it as well. ESC to close the game. Press P to toggle fullscreen.

Your goal is to leave the room by opening the door. Swipe a valid keycard over the scanner to do so. One of those cards in the room has to work...
